edu.ucsb.cs56.games.client_server.v2.client.Models

Class UsernameModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.games.client_server.v2.client.Models.UsernameModel

  • public class UsernameModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Username class stores information about a user, such as name, location, etc rendered by the user list in javaclient
    Version:
    for CS56, Spring 2017
    Author:
    David Roster, Harrison Wang

    • Constructor Detail

      • UsernameModel

        public UsernameModel(java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String location,
                     int style)
        UsernameModel Constructor takes in the parameters name, location, and style to create a categorizing class of the user's personal info
        Parameters:
        name - the respected name of each client
        location - location of the client on the server
        style - generates the correct style of font for the client

        Parameters:
        None -
        Returns:
        This method will either return getName() -if location is null- or getName()+location

        Returns:
